Release notes release/0.8¶

Released 2018-05-11

Changes¶

  • Merge pull request #66 from miraculixx/patrick/fix-masked-filter 6570bd3

  • variuos performance improvements add job slides viewer fix large scale insertion timeout make masked-alike dataframe filtering work masked filters dataframe-style now work 982b736

  • variuos performance improvements add job slides viewer fix large scale insertion timeout 34ee3e2

  • Merge pull request #64 from miraculixx/patrick/various-performance-updates 614c3bd

  • variuos performance improvements 25c3c02

  • Merge pull request #63 from miraculixx/patrick/add-streaming-tutorial 774507e

  • Merge pull request #62 from miraculixx/patrick/improve-numpy-support 6e6b4bd

  • add minibatch/streaming tutorial 20d18d2

  • improved sklearn, pandas and numpy support for position indexables 4bf0cf2
